controlled_vocabulary.comment: This table provides the restricted vocabulary for the column model description in the table spotter and is used to describe the technology source for spotting the probe onto a surface- it is only relevant in array technologies

term.name: MGuide
term.description: Brown Lab microarray, Western Technology, Newport, Dell,Teco Inc., McMasters see Brown Lab Homepage for additional parts and instructions

term.name: Arrayer
term.description: DNA microarrayer by Affymetrix, was the GMS 417 before Affymetrix acquired Genetic Microsystems

term.name: GMS
term.description: The Genetic Microsystems 417, now owned and marketed by Affymetrix

term.name: ScienceChips
term.description: was BioTechnologies, is now GeneScan Europe

term.name: BioRobotics
term.description: was BioTechnologies, is now GeneScan Europe

term.name: BioGrid
term.description: nylon membrane macro array from BioRobotics
